title: The Call of the Wild (Part 7)
description: The surviving members of the team stumble upon the camp of John Thornton. When Hal beats the exhausted Buck nearly to death, John Thornton attacks him and saves Buck. The Americans ignore John Thornton's warnings and lead the rest of the team and themselves to their doom.
meta: Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions, to understand a text
Analyze Plot : Analyze plot throughout a text
Hyphenated and Compound Words : Identify and use hyphenated compound adjectives
